page.title: 02Traffic flow in Auckley
page.content: A lot of of traffic flows through Auckley,on the main road,although little actually stops.The traffic that originates from Auckley is mainly commuting traffic.Most vehicles are probably either coming from or going to R.A.F.Finningley. In a census of the different types of vehicles passing through Auckley,we found that: {14% ESTATE CARS {31% SALOON CARS }On average 6 { {24% HATCH BACKS }vehicles passed {3% SPORTS CARS }through Auckley {14% VANS }every minute. {1% TRACTORS {13% LORRIES { }Over three quarters of the above vehicles had male drivers.While most had 2 passengers or less.Over half of the vehicles were aged 6 years or less.
